# VEHICLE::SET_VEHICLE_BRAKE_LIGHTS

## Summary
Forces a vehicles brake lights on or off, needs to be called each frame to override the vehicle AI

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **BOOL** on
